mapper.insert: INSERT INTO zzw_loan (loan_date, borrower_id, due_date, item_id) VALUES (#{loanDate}, #{borrowerId}, #{dueDate}, #{itemId})
mapper.select: SELECT loan.id AS loan_id, loan.loan_date, loan.borrower_id, loan.due_date, loan.item_id, item.library_code, title.name AS title_name FROM zzw_loan AS loan INNER JOIN zzw_item item ON loan.id = item.m_loan INNER JOIN zzw_title title on item.title_id = title.id WHERE loan.borrower_id = #{borrowerId}
